Posts.Content: hi there sorry to hear your news! my mum was on herceptin for a long time with no real side effects she  was just a bit tired after wards for a few days then she was ok! hope this helps you xx
Posts.Title: Need help quickly

Posts.Content: hi there is there any body out there with a positive story of breast cancer gone to the brain.my mum has just been told the  bad  news a would love to hear a good story or advice.she begins radiothearpy this week and is on 8 steroid a day!! please can any body help its secondry breast cancer that has spred she has 6 tummors in her brain and has short term memory loss such as what day is it etc. many thanks
